channel.title: Do you
channel.description:
you have a hot girlfriend. youve been going out for 7 months. you honestly love her, and she loves you. you would do anything for her. shes already cheated on you 3 times but you forgave. she tells you she cheated on you again, but she says she stopped. you have a convorsation ,everything seems clear. she removes you from #1 on myspace to #4. then you get a accidental text that says this
her: "I'm not going to be able to come visit tonight : ((((( My mom flipped. She's like 'you and this boy.' i cant believe you alyx. and blah. im sorry hun : ("
you go: "what do you mean" her: "wrong..person." you: "wow" her: ":("

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_torture_methods_and_devices

HAHAHAHA.
I miss you, Megan.

Devices; Abyssals Dildo. (Re: Our Epic Story which we’ve lost)

That is why we must write another one that is ten times better. Because that other one that we wrote was just random shit that we came up with while in a group chat with “the gang”. And then we just kinda posted random crap and waited for one of use to continue the string of retardation.
[/quote]

and then Kane came in without pants and he…[/quote]
Shut up Scott. This problem is solved therefore I’m locking this thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Do you
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

en.wikipedia.org

Tickle torture

Tickle torture is the use of tickling to abuse, dominate, harass, humiliate, or interrogate an individual. While laughter is popularly thought of as a pleasure response, in tickle torture, the one being tickled may laugh despite whether or not they find the experience pleasant. In a tickling situation, laughter can indicate a panic reflex rather than a pleasure response. Tickle torture may be a consensual activity or one that is forced, depending on the circumstances. In a consensual form, tic Ch...

Tehe. Its painful

item.title: Do you
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

ok serious answer time.

I for one know how painful and horrible something as wonderful as love can be.

But you know in your heart that what you have with her, or what you feel, cant possibly last. The reason she cheats on you is because you cant give her something. My main guess would be a backbone. Your letting your girlfriend cheat on you.

I can gurantee if you cheated on her, she would dump you in a second, and most likely kick your ass. So why let her cheat on you?

I know it hurts, and it wont stop hurting for a very long time. You dump her, and you will probably feel ever more worse, but itl pass…eventualy. Trust me, the pain of loosing someone will be alot less than the pain of keeping someone you know you shouldnt.

Read full topic
